name: Go Go Chicken !!
description:
Updated to version 2.0.5 (Bug Fixes) :- * Fix for initial loading screen taking too long to respond,

  The bug of the initial loading screen not responding for a while even when player already pressed the key is still there. The solution is click on the game screen once and then press any key and menu should load up. 

* Fixed the warning sign showing up, when on the ladder

          Even tough the spikes don't pop out on the ladder in easy mode, the warning was still appearing which is now fixed.

* Fixed lava not affecting player in the difficult mode. 

       Lava in difficult mode which was not working on previous version, is now fixed.         Player will instantly die if he falls in the lava.

Move, Jump, Climb or Fly but don't stop moving. Join the cute chick in a endless threatening room ! Survive as long as you can and Collect worms to increase your score.
